author: Henry Cutter
title: Whistleblowing Hotlines: A Gray Area Under EU’s New Privacy Law - Risk & Compliance Journal. - WSJ
text:
The EU’s sweeping new data-privacy law is in force at last. Exactly how it will work for companies with whistleblower hotlines, though, is an open question. The privacy overhaul, painted with a broad brush, left gray areas when it comes to data collected via whistleblowing hotlines, which often channel highly sensitive allegations from corporate staff […]
